description: A new software tool for interpreting the cellular and network origin of human MEG/EEG data | The Human Neocortical Neurosolver (HNN) is a software tool that gives researchers/clinicians the ability to develop/test hypotheses on circuit mechanisms underlying EEG/MEG data | Click here to join our Google Group | Human Neocortical Neurosolver (HNN) is a user-friendly software tool that provides a novel solution to this challenge | Electro- and magneto-encephalography (EEG MEG) are among the most powerful technologies to non-invasively record human brain activity with millisecond resolution
name: HNN
